thread.title: Upendra at a screening of Uppi 2 in Chicago
thread.title_full: Upendra at a screening of Uppi 2 in Chicago - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Upendra at a screening of Uppi 2 in Chicago
text:
You don't need to come to Bangalore to get a glimpse of Kannada star Upendra. The actor has taken it upon himself to step out there and meet his fans... not just within the country but outside too. Upendra is currently on a tour abroad to promote his film Uppi 2 - one that has been met with mixed reviews. He recently enjoyed a screening with Kannadigas and fans living in Chicago . Non resident Indians living abroad who made it to this particular show were thrilled to bits to be able to watch the film along with the lead actor. Tweets about how the actor is so down-to-earth came up non stop.
The film Uppi 2 dwells on various possibilities of story threads, and Upendra, who has also written and directed the film has tried to convey two main things through this story. One is to live in the present, and the other is the fact that one sees believes only what one wants to believe and see as the truth.
